item.title: HOME BANCORP INC 10-K
item.description: HOME BANCORP INC, which is in the Savings Institutions, Not Federally Chartered [6036] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 10, 2022 had 34106 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: loans - 540 instances company - 412 instances 1 - 411 instances 31 - 327 instances interest - 325 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
